SEARCH
Package com.sc2002.repositories

Class ProjectRepo

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.repositories.ProjectRepo
All Implemented Interfaces:
RepoInterface<BTOProjectModel,Integer>
public class ProjectRepo extends Object implements RepoInterface<BTOProjectModel,Integer>
Manages the storage and retrieval of BTO project data. Implements the RepoInterface for standard repository operations and adds project-specific finders.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private List<BTOProjectModel>
    projects
    In-memory list to store all BTO project instances.

      public BTOProjectModel findByID(Integer projectID)
      Description copied from interface: RepoInterface

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      projectID - The unique ID of the item to find.
      Returns:

    • getAllProject

      public Map<Integer,String> getAllProject()
      Retrieves all projects as a map of Project ID to Project Name.
      Returns:
      A Map where keys are project IDs and values are project names.

    • getProjectsByManagerID

      public List<BTOProjectModel> getProjectsByManagerID(int managerUserID)
      Finds all projects managed by a specific Manager User ID.
      Parameters:
      managerUserID - The User ID of the manager.
      Returns:
      A list of BTO projects managed by the specified manager.

    • getProjectsByOfficer

      public List<BTOProjectModel> getProjectsByOfficer(UserModel currentUser)
      Finds all projects managed by a specific HDB Officer.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The UserModel of the officer.
      Returns:
      A list of BTO projects managed by the specified officer.

    • findByFilter

      public List<BTOProjectModel> findByFilter(AppContext appContext)
      Finds projects based on the filter criteria set in the current user's ProjectViewFilterModel. Filters by neighborhood, flat type availability, and applicant eligibility (age, marital status).
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context containing the current user and their filters.
      Returns:
      A list of BTO projects matching the filter criteria.

    • findPersonalByFilter

      public List<BTOProjectModel> findPersonalByFilter(AppContext appContext)
      Finds projects relevant to the current user (managed projects for officers/managers) based on the filter criteria set in their ProjectViewFilterModel. Filters by neighborhood and flat type availability.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context containing the current user and their filters.
      Returns:
      A list of relevant BTO projects matching the filter criteria.

    • getLastProjectID

      public int getLastProjectID()
      This function returns the project ID of the last project in a list of projects.
      Returns:
      The method `getLastProjectID` returns the project ID of the last project in the list of projects.

    • hasDateConflict

      public boolean hasDateConflict(LocalDate newOpeningDate, LocalDate newClosingDate, AppContext appContext)
      Checks if there is a date conflict between the specified opening and closing dates and the existing projects managed by the current user.
      Parameters:
      newOpeningDate - The proposed opening date for the new project.
      newClosingDate - The proposed closing date for the new project.
      appContext - The application context containing the current user and other services.
      Returns:
      true if there is a date conflict with an existing project managed by the current user, false otherwise.
